titles.title: Permanent Death Tax Repeal Act of 2003
To make the repeal of the estate tax permanent.
Permanent Death Tax Repeal Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Permanent Death Tax Repeal Act of 2003 - Amends title IX (Compliance with Congressional Budget Act) of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 (P.L. 107-16) to repeal the sunset provisions applicable to title V (Estate, Gift, and Generation-Skipping Transfer Taxes) of such Act.
